description: Acer platanoides  LZ02083: Crown reduce to previous reduction points.  Regrowth to be removed in the range of 2 to 3m length, pruning back to previous pruning points;Salix caprea LZ00495: Pollard to circa 3m height;Fraxinus excelsior (no tag - Woodland Walk): Fell;Arbutus unedo: Reduce overall height to 2.5m and reshape lower growth, by reducing by approximately 0.5m;Fraxinus excelsior LZ02096: Fell;Prunus avium LZ02196: Crown reduce whole crown by 2m;Catalpa bignonioides LZ02238: Crown reduce whole crown by 2m;Acer platanoides LZ02319: Crown reduce lateral growth by 2m, without reducing height, tapering lateral reduction in towards the top of the tree to create a natural oval canopy shape;Aesculus indica LZ02391: Crown reduce whole crown by 2-2.5m.  Prune back from building to give 1m clearance;Platanus x hispanica LZ02429: Crown reduce whole crown by 2.5-3m;Acer pseudoplatanus LZ02451: Fell;Salix alba LZ02491: Crown reduce remainder of crown by same amount as previously reduced upright scaffold member;Fraxinus excelsior LZ02600: Fell;Fraxinus excelsior LZ02607: Fell;Prunus avium LZ02852: Fell;Arbutus x andrachnoides LZ03012: Crown reduce whole crown by 1m;Aesculus indica LZ03128: Crown reduce whole crown by 2m;Acer platanoides LZ03167: Crown reduce whole crown by 1m;Prunus avium LZ03207: Fell;Salix x sepulcralis LZ02533: Reduce southern scaffold back to the stem kink at 8/9m, where the limb on the upper side grows to the north east.  Reduce the large lateral limb growing towards the Eucalyptus, pruning back to the initially upright side branch circa 2m from the main stem.
